item.description:
Central CT Singles invites you to Extreme Neon Bowling with Half-Price Games!

Saturday, December 22 at 8 pm

Bowl 2 games for only $9 (including shoes)!

Free Pool and Darts * Prizes * Drink Specials

Join us for the party and meet local singles at the Legends Lounge in:

AMF Bowling Center
748 Silver Lane
East Hartford, CT 06118
Phone: (860) 569-2990

We will have music, movies, FREE Pool and Darts, and gift certificates, and lots prizes!

RSVP Today

Tickets are only $15
item.how_to_find_us: We will be wearing black CTNites.com VIP Entertainment Clubber T-Shirts.
item.why: Meet local singles at fun events!

group.name: CTMatch Singles Events Music Dance Speed Dating Golf Comedy

item.name: Central CT Singles - Half-Price Bowling and Pool in East Hartford
